properties.verseOrder: v1 v1 v1 v1 v1 c1 v1 v1 v1 c1 v1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: But for your grace I could not be saved

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: But for your grace I would go my way.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: I'm forever grateful that you have been faithful to me, Lord,

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: Amazing grace how sweet the sound

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: That saved a wretch like me.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: You have been faithful to me, Lord,

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
I'm forever grateful that you have been faithful to me, Lord,
For your amazing grace.
For your amazing grace.
